content: jason and i have a running joke where every time i message him while i m out and about or check my e-mail he replies with a good hardy tréo i love my tréo and he loves his itouch and we are pretty happy using our little gadgets he has a nice industrial clear jason has informed me that it s black with faux leather snap case for his and for my little tréo i don t have anything it s getting pretty banged up already in my bag this is an issue that needs some solving so here we go a little tréo pocket it also fits around most smart phones and since i made quite a few to work out the pattern i have a change purse and a new wallet for my cards and such i m going to fix those up with some velcro to keep the change in best of all it only takes about 25g of any sport weight yarn hooray for using up scraps and half skeins
